title: Energy Unit Converter – Joules, Calories, kWh, BTU, Wh, eV

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Base relationships 1 J = 1 J (by definition) 1 kJ = 1000 J 1 MJ = 1,000,000 J Heat & chemistry 1 cal (thermochemical) = 4.184 J 1 kcal = 4184 J = 1000 cal 1 BTU (international table) = 1055.056 J Electrical energy 1 Wh = 3600 J 1 kWh = 3.6×10⁶ J Physics units 1 eV = 1.602176634×10⁻¹⁹ J (exact) 1 Hartree (Eₕ) ≈ 4.3597447×10⁻¹⁸ J

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
